description:
Please apply directly through our careers page: 
https://www.edecree.com/careers-front-1
We are currently looking to hire several long term part-time and full-time legal transcription typists. This position is in office with both part-time and full-time opportunities. This job involves both standard transcription work as well as performing quality assurance audio reviews of completed transcripts. These are employee roles, not contractors.
Responsibilities

 Typing verbatim transcripts of pre-recorded audio and video legal proceedings.
 Learning and following client house rules (i.e. client-specific preferences in formatting, spelling, capitalization, and editing conventions)
 Holding all third-party (client) information in the strictest confidentiality
 Reviewing completed work to identify potential areas of self-improvement

Requirements

 Strong English grammar and comprehension
 Ability to understand global accents
 Minimum 80 Words per Minute typing speed
 Computer literacy with strong MS Word skills
 Ability to understand at least one or more of the following accents in the English language is required:
 West African (including Nigeria, Ghana, Liberia, Mali)
 East African (including Sudan, South Sudan, Kenya, Uganda, Ethiopia, Eritrea, Djibouti, Somalia)
 South Asian accents (including India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Afghanistan)
 East Asian accents (including China, Korea, Japan, Thailand, Indonesia)
 Middle Eastern accents (including Iran, Iraq, Turkey)
 Eastern Bloc European accents (including Russia, Romania, Georgia)
 Latin American accents (including Mexico, Chile, Brazil, Venezuela)
 French accents (including Quebec, France, Congo, Cameroon)
 Strong command of a second language beyond English is preferred
 Previous transcription experience is not a requirement, we will train successful candidates.
 At least 18 years of age due to violent and graphic content.
 Current RCMP criminal background check Level 1 upon hiring.
 Eligible candidates are required to have lived in Canada for the last 5 years

Please Note: Content being processed contains graphic details of sexual and physical violence. Successful candidates need to be comfortable with this content. The interview process will screen for ability to handle such content.
Work Location & Hours

 Office located at 116 Albert Street, Suite 200 & 300, Ottawa ON, K1P 5G3, Canada
 Open from Monday to Friday
 Open from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m

Compensation

 Starts at $18/hour, and can go up to $21/hour depending on performance
 If you have 5 years or more of verifiable transcription experience, your base hourly rate will begin at $21/hr
 Three month probation
 Vacation as per ESA standards, and is paid out on each pay cheque
 Full health benefits are provided, including pharma, dental, eye, chiro, physio, etc., after three months of probation, for all staff working at least 32 hours per week.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent
Salary: $18.00-$21.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Casual dress
 Dental care
 Extended health care
 Vision care

Schedule:

 8 hour shift
 Day shift
 Evening shift
 Monday to Friday
 Morning shift
 Weekends as needed

Work Location: In person
